summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.9°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3447 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11052 lux), cloud levels (up 1566 m), feels like temperature (up 4.6°C), and outside temperature (up 3.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 95.5m lower than yesterday, 950.2m lower than past week, 1566.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1170.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
